detectors.description:

	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(CBToken(_token).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(_wallet),_price),Transaction failed) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcommerceStore.sol#703)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- productIdInStore[productIndex] = msg.sender (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcommerceStore.sol#718)
	- productIndex += 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcommerceStore.sol#706)
	- stores[msg.sender][productIndex] = product (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/EcommerceStore.sol#717)
